column3: School of Health and Sports Sciences
column5: IntroductionThis accelerated course aims to prepare existing graduates for an exciting and rewarding career as a Registered Nurse (Adult). You will undertake a range of theory modules across the 2-year programme, complemented by clinical practice placements to allow you to develop the skills, knowledge and experience required by nurses delivering healthcare across a wide range of clinical settings.
column7: Full-time tuition fee: £9,495 p.a. Full-time International tuition fee: £14,607 p.a
